meanings.definition: The quality or state of being friendly and informal, especially in a simple and down-to-earth way.
meanings.sent1: Her folksiness made everyone feel welcome at the gathering.
meanings.sent2: The folksiness of the small cafe attracted locals looking for a cozy spot.
meanings.sent3: The folksiness of the dog wagging its tail at strangers was endearing.
meanings.sent4: The folksiness of the old bookstore embraced visitors like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: His folksiness shone through in the way he greeted each person with a smile.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being typical or representative of a particular group of people, especially in a rural or small-town setting.
meanings.sent1: The folksiness of the town fair captured the essence of community spirit.
meanings.sent2: The folksiness of the local diner was a favorite among residents.
meanings.sent3: The folksiness of the quirky traditions added charm to the village.
meanings.sent4: The folksiness of the old barn symbolized the history of the farm.
meanings.sent5: In that small town, folksiness was evident in every friendly wave and smile.
